statement.name: UPDATE_SMAMAT
statement.sql: UPDATE SMAMAT SET NOMMAT = ?, NPQMAT = ?, NROARE = ?, CRDMAT = ?, PJAMAT = ?, PJBMAT =?, PJCMAT = ?, PJDMAT = ? , TEOMAT = ?, PRAMAT = ?, INVMAT = ?, TIPAUL = ?, TPOMAT = ?, KLCMAT = ?, NTSMAT = ?, HABMAT = ?, LBLMAT = ?, KNPMAT = ?, INTMAT = ?,SMNMAT =?, RTCMAT = ?, VTRMAT = ?, CLRMAT = ?, NGRMAT = ?, CODMDL =?,IDEDKS=? WHERE trim(CODMAT) =? and trim(nromat)=?

statement.name: GETREC
statement.sql: SELECT *, CASE WHEN NROELM IN (SELECT CODRXM FROM SMARXM WHERE CODMAT =? AND CODCIA=? AND TPORXM='REC' AND STDRXM='ACTIVO ..' THEN 'CHECKED' ELSE ' ' END AS CHKREC FROM SMAELM WHERE CODELM ='MAT' AND TIPELM='RQRS'

statement.name: DELETETRXM
statement.sql: delete from smarxm where nromat=? and tporxm=?
